fullText: [1] Gorgias Press is offering a 15-30% pre-publication discount on new reprints of rare books on Syriac studies and other fields. A small limited number of copies of each title is available at the reduced price. Please reserve your copy now. [2] For a complete catalogue, visit www.gorgiaspress.com , or write to Gorgias Press, 46 Orris Ave., Piscataway, NJ 08854, Tel. 732-699-0343, Fax. 732-699-0342, E-mail: info@gorgiaspress.com.
title: Gorgias Press Announces Over 100 New Reprints
Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies
author: Kiraz, George A.
displayTitleEnglish: Gorgias Press Announces Over 100 New Reprints
